abstract: British lawyer Mark Lewis is one of a small handful of attorneys who have led the civil litigation against News Corporation over suspected phone hacking at its now-closed News of the World tabloid; the scandal has not jumped to the United States, but Lewis is holding meetings in New York to look into filing at least three suits related to the hacking.
